title: Bug 9654Modify Parameters: Dialog details
description: Bug 9654Modify Parameters: Dialog details duplicated name validation could be performed on the first pagei. the first and second column could be mergedj.
OB: a. The buttons in the dialog are too small. b. When the dialog comes up, no table entry is selected, but both move buttons are enabled. c. When changing a parameter name to something very long, the preview is cut off. d. The dialog appears huge for methods with many parameters.
